result.adr_address: 373號 Queen's Rd E, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 373號 Queen's Rd E, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: Golden Valley

reviews.text: Best of Cantonese and Sichuan cuisine. Dim sum available at lunch. Relatively small and cosy. Excellent service. Forget the prices. Just enjoy.

This restaurant has a lot of potential but it deserves a 1 star review. 

1) blatant racism. If you are not ethnic Chinese, don’t bother. They’ll make it very clear you are not welcome. 

2) the space itself isn’t welcoming. The lighting is harsh and decidedly not cozy. 

3) the food simply doesn’t deserve the high praise that it was given in the past. You can find better food for cheaper in more welcoming restaurants. 

Avoid if you can.
Opulent surroundings, very good soup base and condiments, 3 star prices for 1 star quality food - so to speak.
Food is well made, but pricey and like it is not enough, they were ripping off with the bill!

This is the place if you looking for a nice, quiet atmosphere, proper service and some delicious Sichuan food. The 2 appetizers were tasty yet the chicken pot is on the salty side. We also had a non spicy vegetables in fish soup which gives the meal a nice balance. And to wrap, a dandan noodle, I like the noodle texture, the soup base is not as thick and heavy as usual ones. I would love to try their hotpot one day as most tables had that but since we only 2 pax, we need till next time.

result.adr_address: 香港灣仔皇后大道東373號
result.formatted_address: 香港灣仔皇后大道東373號
result.name: 駿景軒粵菜廳

reviews.text: 好👌

第一  先說環境，搬新址後沒有之前在跑馬地古色古香，地方不算太大，不過乾淨。
第二  食物，高水準，老婆嘴刁刁，都食到大讚，由其是隻燒雞，皮薄肉滑，平時她最討厭食雞的，都食了成半 。
最後  侍應，很禮貌熱情。
這裡食物很一般，較以往差很遠，沒有特出之處。
Best of Cantonese and Sichuan cuisine. Dim sum available at lunch. Relatively small and cosy. Excellent service. Forget the prices. Just enjoy.

This restaurant has a lot of potential but it deserves a 1 star review. 

1) blatant racism. If you are not ethnic Chinese, don’t bother. They’ll make it very clear you are not welcome. 

2) the space itself isn’t welcoming. The lighting is harsh and decidedly not cozy. 

3) the food simply doesn’t deserve the high praise that it was given in the past. You can find better food for cheaper in more welcoming restaurants. 

Avoid if you can.

result.adr_address: 373 Queen's Rd E, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 373 Queen's Rd E, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: The Emperor Hotel Wan Chai

reviews.text: A good hotel for business travel. Has a nice restaurant and a Fitness room. Rooms are not big but cosy. Beds are comfy. Very close to the trendy Wan Chai area and Hopewell Centre office tower. I stayed here for 12 days on a business trip and would do so again.

I stay in a Deluxe room, i feel its bit contested and if you  feel to work from hotel , it will be very difficult since you only have  small round table and chair, where you cannot keep your mouse if you wish to, it just fits the laptop. Breakfast is really disappointing and monotonous, I have been staying here for almost  5 days there wasn't any change in the breakfast. Previously i have been staying in Dorset hotel , I loved it, far far better that this hotel.

A good place in a Hotel for Dim Sum. Quiet and away from business. Dim Sum overall is good. Worth a try if you are in the area and you are looking for Dim Sum but not necessary so good that you travel far to find it.

Had dinner at the Monkey Cafe. Good food, even better service! Very reasonably priced for the setting, service and location. Hotel is easy walking distance from shopping and sights in Causeway Bay and Wanchai.

Fantastic hotel with decent breakfast and beddings. The staffs were very helpful and professional. Absolutely enjoyed our stay. A bit away from the central area but the public transport is convenient to get around in hk anyway. Would definitely stay here again.

result.adr_address: 香港灣仔皇后大道東373號

result.name: 英皇駿景酒店

reviews.text: A good hotel for business travel. Has a nice restaurant and a Fitness room. Rooms are not big but cosy. Beds are comfy. Very close to the trendy Wan Chai area and Hopewell Centre office tower. I stayed here for 12 days on a business trip and would do so again.

인근 지역 쇼핑가능. 하지만 걸어서 10분정도 걸립니다.
가장 중요한건 쇼핑 가능 지역에서 언덕을 넘어가야 합니다.
처음 그거모르고 완차이 시장 구경하면서 캐리어 끌고 갔는데 언덕때문에 죽는줄알았습니다. 한여름엔 지옥과 같습니다. 
호텔 앞에 버스 있지만 버스 거의 안다니고 이동시 100프로 우버나 택시 이용했습니다. 접근성 생각한다면 덥지 않은날은 괜찮으나 더운날은 생각좀 해보시기 바랍니다.
호텔 시설은 깔끔합니다. 조식도 그냥 요기정도 하는걸로 괜찮습니다. 수압이 쌔서 아주 좋았고 17층에서 숙박했는데 엘레베이터가 빨라서 이동시 좋았습니다.

가성비는 확실히 좋은 곳으로 보입니다만, 이건 바로 옆의 도르셋이나 코스모도 마찬가지이고, 몇가지 불편한 점이 있었습니다 - 1) 장소가 상당히 애매한 곳에 있어서 코즈웨이베이까지 약 10분, 완차이까지도 약 10분은 걸어야 합니다 / 2) 주변에 편의점이 없습니다 / 3) 택시 잡기가 매우 힙듭니다 / 4) 바닥이 카페트라 눅눅한 느낌이고 얼룩도 조금 있었습니다 / 5) 조식이 (비싸지는 않으나 그래서 그런지) 별로였습니다(추천하지 않음) / 6) (제가 묵은 방이 싼 방이어서 그런지 몰라도) 냉장고가 없었습니다 / 7) 에어컨을 키면 엄청 추운데(6월이었지만 추웠음) 조절이 안됩니다 - 다행히 꺼지기는 해서 잘때는 끄고 잤습니다 / 8) 한국 TV 채널은 없네요 ... 다만, 좋은 점도 있는데 - 1) 우선 가성비는 매우 좋은 편입니다만 이건 옆 2개 호텔도 그렇고, 2) 위치가 애매하긴 하지만 만약 stanley 쪽이나 south horizon 등 남쪽으로 가기에는 오히려 좋은게 한 5분 정도 걸으면 버스 정류장이 있는데 거기서 버스 타면 바로 터널 지나기 때문에 stanley나 south horizon에는 정말 금새 갑니다 / 정리하면 가성비는 좋으나! 역시 싼 곳이라 한계가 있었습니다 ... causeway bay에서 time square쪽으로 좀 좋은 곳 가려면 crown plaza 가야할 듯 싶은데, 거긴 많이 비쌉니다 ;;;

房間莫名熱水來的慢。
冷氣真的冷。
明明掛了「打掃」
結果地板還是有垃圾⋯⋯
好奇打掃定義是？
飯店早餐普通，
交通不是那麼便利。
附近沒有便利商店。
房間衛生太差，洗手間內到處發霉，地壇上 太多污漬 希望下次可以改善
